plasma: ʻO ke kūlana o ka mea i loaʻa i nā ʻāpana i kau ʻia (iona a me nā electrons)
ionic: Hoʻokumu ʻia ka paʻa e ka huki ʻana ma waena o nā ion i hoʻopaʻa ʻia
covalent: Hoʻokumu ʻia ka pilina ma ke kaʻana like ʻana o nā electron ma waena o nā mana
metala: Hoʻokumu ʻia ka paʻa e ka huki ʻana ma waena o nā cation metala maikaʻi a me nā electrons delocaled
kaulike kaulike: Hoʻohālikelike kemika me nā helu like o nā ʻātoma o kēlā me kēia mea ma nā ʻaoʻao ʻelua
mole: ʻĀpana i hoʻohana ʻia no ke ana ʻana i ka nui o kahi mea (ka helu o nā ʻāpana o Avogadro)
helu lehulehu: Ka huina o nā protons a me nā neutrons i loko o ka nucleus o ka atom
helu atomika: Ka helu o nā protons i loko o ka nucleus o ka atom
isotope: Nā ʻātoma o ka mea like me nā helu like ʻole o nā neutrons
oxidation: Nalo o nā electrons mai kahi ʻātoma a mole
hoemi ana: Loaʻa i nā electrons e kahi ʻātoma a i ʻole mole
redox: ʻO ka hopena kemika e pili ana i nā kaʻina hana oxidation a hoʻemi
ikehu ho'\u0101la: ʻO ka ikehu liʻiliʻi e pono ai no ka hopena kemika
mea ho\u02bbop\u0101p\u0101: Mea hoʻonui i ka wikiwiki o ka hopena kemika me ka ʻole o ka ʻai ʻia
thermodynamics: ʻO ka lālā o ke kemika pili i ka wela, ka hana, ka mahana, a me ka ikehu
endothermic: ʻO ka hopena kemika e hoʻopaʻa i ka wela mai nā wahi a puni
exothermic: ʻO ka hopena kemika e hoʻokuʻu ana i ka wela i ka puni
